Interface ManagerToMaster

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
MasterImpl
public interface ManagerToMaster
extends java.rmi.Remote

An interface that defines the contract between a Worker Manager and a master

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam
